headers.name: Access-Token
headers.description: Authorized access token. For details, see Authentication .

headers.name: Content-Type
headers.description: Content type of the request. Allowed value: application/json

parameters.name: blocked_words
parameters.description: List of blocked words that you want to export. If not specified, all blocked words will be exported. Note : Unblocked words specified via this field will be ignored. Therefore, if you specify both blocked words and unblocked words at the same time via this field, only the blocked words will be exported.

parameters.name: language
parameters.description: Language of the headers of the exported data. Enum values: EN , JA , ZH . Default value: EN .

top_fields.name: message
top_fields.description: The return message. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .

top_fields.name: code
top_fields.description: The return code. For details, see Appendix - Return Codes .
